text: Fan yuan bi dazui [jian 6:152-153] He jianyin [zhu], zhi fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi zui kuanrong de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen [ru a dan shengren] shi, dang nimen haishi tai'er zai nimen de mu fu zhong shi, ta shi zui zhidao nimen de. Suoyi, nimen buyao zi cheng chunjie, ta zui zhidao shei shi jingwei zhe.
